text: are you getting tired of your same old
topping for your hot dog I know I was
until we came up with some great new
ideas that are in our July issue you
should check it out today I'm going to
show you one of them like a corn dog but
the corn is fresh corn you start off by
charring some Cornette you need about
two cups of fresh corn to get corn off
the cob it's a little bit messy but just
slice down the cob with a really sharp
knife and then clean up after yourself
that's all I can say they kind of make a
mess so actually let me show you a tip
there are other ways to do this get a
pan and then put the corn tip on the pan
and then cut into the pan that'll
actually catch some of the flyaways and
I need to put these into a hot skillet
hot dry skillet 2 cups pan needs to be
hot and no oil you get a better char
that way while that's charring make a
little dressing just mayonnaise in lime
juice really you're tablespoons of
mayonnaise 2 tablespoons of lime juice
that's it it's the whole sauce this is
really actually more like Mexican corn
where they put mayonnaise and then
cheese on it sort of a combo of corn dog
in that now that's really smoky smells
like it's on the road after the corn has
charred add 2 scallions the white parts
gonna go into the pan and with the corn
and the green you can save for garnish a
little bit of oil just 2 teaspoons live
life on the edge 1/2 and then stir until
they're tender shouldn't take very long
how about a little salt don't over salt
though because the mayonnaise mixture a
